column4: Welcome, you are now talking to an AI doctor. As I am part of a scientific experiment, I would appreciate it if you could take the time to answer a super short questionnaire at the end of the interview. Tap Speak to ask your question and then tap Send to submit it to me.
Hello, how's the weather in Mannheim today?
I'm sorry, I'm not able to answer that question as it's not medically relevant. Is there something medically related I can help you with today?
What can I do to prevent my body from cancer?

There are various things you can do to reduce your risk of developing cancer, such as avoiding tobacco and alcohol, protecting your skin from UV radiation, eating a balanced diet, exercising regularly, and maintaining a healthy weight. Additionally, numerous preventive screenings can help to detect cancers early when they can often be more effectively treated.
